frontmatter.description: A couple of months back I had won the full year of free egghead courses in one of the Gatsby contests and one fine day while I was enjoying my free premium access and watching some amazing tutorials on Redux and State Management I came to know about Egghead Portfolio Project Club and I found it interesting because I really believe in learning together. Through this club, I got a chance to meet and learn from some amazing developers from all over the world, and in this post, I would like to describe my experience being a part of this club.
frontmatter.title: My experience with Egghead Portfolio Project Club
